items.name: Elixir of Life
items.description: A legendary potion that fully restores health and increases maximum health temporarily.

items.name: Bear Chieftain's Battle Axe
items.description: The legendary battle axe wielded by the Bear Chieftain. The blade glows with an otherworldly blue light.

items.name: Crystal Plate Armor
items.description: Armor forged from metal and large crystal fragments. It seems to react to danger by hardening.

items.name: Crown of the Bear King
items.description: A crown of gold and crystal worn by the legendary Bear King. It's said to grant the wearer command over bears.

items.name: Ancient Crystal Core
items.description: The core of an ancient crystal of immense power. Its purpose is unknown, but its energy is undeniable.
